TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PagesSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class PagesSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: Provides programmatic access to the section of the configuration file.

span.span: Provides programmatic access to the section of the configuration file.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使您能够以编程方式访问和修改配置文件节的内容。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the content of the configuration file section. 此配置节支持的配置文件的作用域中设置全局范围内的所有页面和控件某些 ASP.NET 页面和控件指令。This configuration section supports setting certain ASP.NET page and control directives globally for all pages and controls in the scope of the configuration file. 这包括`@ Page`指令，`@ Import`指令通过集合属性，与`@ Register`指令通过集合属性。This includes the `@ Page` directive, the `@ Import` directive through the collection property, and the `@ Register` directive through the collection property. 它还提供对在运行时通过将标记类型映射到其他标记类型的支持集合属性。It also provides support for mapping tag types to other tag types at run time through the collection property. 指令指定在处理 ASP.NET Web 窗体页面 (.aspx) 和用户控件 (.ascx) 文件时使用的页和用户控件的编译器设置。Directives specify settings used by the page and user-control compilers when they process ASP.NET Web Forms page (.aspx) and user control (.ascx) files. ## Examples 此示例演示如何以声明方式为的几个特性指定值`pages`部分中，还可作为的成员访问类。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `pages` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 下面的配置文件示例演示如何指定部分以声明方式的值。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the section. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/usingpagessection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/usingpagessection.vb#1)]

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using default settings.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 获取实例类通过方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of seconds to wait for an asynchronous handler to complete during asynchronous page processing.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of seconds to wait for an asynchronous handler to complete during asynchronous page processing.

value.span: A值，该值指示的时间以秒为单位等待异步页处理期间完成的异步处理程序。

span.span: A value indicating the amount of time in seconds to wait for an asynchronous handler to complete during asynchronous page processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 45 秒。The default value is 45 seconds.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoEventWireup { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoEventWireup : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether events for ASP.NET pages are automatically connected to event-handling functions.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether events for ASP.NET pages are automatically connected to event-handling functions.

value.span: 如果 ASP.NET 页的事件将自动连接到事件处理函数;否则为。

span.span: if events for ASP.NET pages are automatically connected to event-handling functions; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当是`true`，ASP.NET 不要求你显式将绑定事件处理程序到页事件如。When is `true`, ASP.NET does not require that you explicitly bind event handlers to a page event such as . 当是`false`，必须显式将该事件绑定到方法。When is `false`, you must explicitly bind the event to a method. 例如，如果你有`Page_Load`在代码页的方法，该方法将调用以响应事件仅当你在编写代码类似的下面的示例 (请注意`Handles`Visual Basic 和事件处理程序中的语句代码在 C# 中）：For example, if you have a `Page_Load` method in the code for a page, the method will be called in response to the event only if you write code like that in the following example (notice the `Handles` statement in Visual Basic and the event handler code in C#): ```vb Partial Class AutoEventWireupExample Inherits System.Web.UI.Page Protected Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load Response.Write("Executing Page_Load") End Sub End Class ``` ```csharp public partial class AutoEventWireupExample : System.Web.UI.Page { protected void Page_Load(object sender, System.EventArgs e) { Response.Write("Executing Page_Load"); } override protected void OnInit(EventArgs e) { this.Load += new System.EventHandler(this.Page_Load); } } ``` 当是`true`，处理程序会自动绑定到事件在运行时根据其名称和签名。When is `true`, handlers are automatically bound to events at run time based on their name and signature. 对于每个事件，ASP.NET 将搜索按照的模式命名的方法`Page_` *eventname*，如`Page_Load`或`Page_Init`。For each event, ASP.NET searches for a method that is named according to the pattern `Page_`*eventname*, such as `Page_Load` or `Page_Init`. ASP.NET 会首先检查重载具有典型的事件处理程序签名 (即，它指定和参数)。ASP.NET checks first for an overload that has the typical event-handler signature (that is, it specifies and parameters). 如果找不到事件处理程序使用此签名，ASP.NET 将检查没有参数的重载。If an event handler with this signature is not found, ASP.NET checks for an overload that has no parameters. 当是`false`，必须显式将绑定事件处理程序的事件，如前面的示例中所示。When is `false`, you must explicitly bind event handlers to events, as shown in the preceding example. 在这种情况下，不需要的方法名称遵循模式。In that case, the method names do not have to follow a pattern. 默认值是`true`如果中未指定`@ Page`指令。The default value is `true` if is not specified in the `@ Page` directive. 创建代码隐藏文件时，visual Studio 将自动包含该属性。Visual Studio automatically includes the attribute when it creates code-behind files. 对于用 C# 编写的 ASP.NET 页，Visual Studio 将值设置为`true`。For ASP.NET pages written in C#, Visual Studio sets the value to `true`. 对于 Visual Basic，Visual Studio 将值设置为`false`因为处理程序会通过使用关键字由 Visual Studio 自动插入，在它生成一个事件处理程序绑定到事件。For Visual Basic, Visual Studio sets the value to `false` because handlers are bound to events by using the keyword, which is inserted automatically by Visual Studio when it generates an event handler. 如果你设置到`true`，你可以省略 （或删除） 关键字。If you set to `true`, you can omit (or remove) the keyword. 未设置到`true`如果性能是关键的考虑事项。Do not set to `true` if performance is a key consideration. 启用自动事件连接后，必须在 15 到 30 尝试与方法匹配事件之间进行 ASP.NET。When automatic event wireup is enabled, ASP.NET must make between 15 and 30 tries to match events with methods. 请注意下列有关绑定到事件的事件处理程序：Note the following about binding event handlers to events: - 如果你设置到`true`，请确保，你不可以手动附加页事件处理程序到事件。If you set to `true`, make sure that you do not also manually attach page event handlers to events. 如果这样做，则可能会不止一次调用处理程序。If you do, handlers might be called more than one time. - 仅对不用于页上的控件的事件的页事件执行自动的绑定。Automatic binding is performed only for page events, not for events for controls on the page. - 作为绑定事件写入处理程序的替代方法，您可以重写`On` *eventname*方法或控件的页面。As an alternative to binding events to handlers, you can override the `On`*eventname* methods of the page or of controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置或读取在代码中的属性。The following code example shows how to set or read the property in code. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/usingpagessection.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/usingpagessection.vb#9)] 下面的示例演示自动附加到页事件的方法签名的两种形式时是`true`。The following example shows the two forms of method signatures that are automatically attached to page events when is `true`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/Default.aspx#50)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/Default2.aspx.cs#50)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/Default.aspx#50)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/Default2.aspx.vb#50)] 下面的示例演示如何显式连接事件时是`false`。The following example shows how to explicitly wire up events when is `false`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/Default.aspx.cs#51)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/Default.aspx.vb#51)]

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用响应缓冲后，页或控件输出进行缓冲直到整个页面或处理控件。When response buffering is turned on, the page or control output is buffered until after the entire page or control is processed. 未设置到`true`如果性能是关键的考虑事项。Do not set to `true` if performance is a key consideration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. public: property bool EnableEventValidation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EnableEventValidation : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether event validation is enabled.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether event validation is enabled.

value.span: 如果事件验证已启用;否则为。

span.span: if event validation is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否应执行事件验证。The attribute indicates whether event validation should be performed. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. Web 应用程序可以 （可选） 禁用事件验证还原为.NET Framework 1.0 版行为。A Web application can optionally disable event validation to revert to .NET Framework version 1.0 behavior. 基本控件将检查此特性，以确定它是否应验证事件。The base control checks this attribute to determine whether it should validate events. 派生的控件不会继承此基控件属性，并因此情况下不从默认的事件验证。A derived control does not inherit this base control attribute, and so it is exempt from event validation by default. 你仍可以指示 ASP.NET 加上派生的控件上执行事件验证本身并将它设置为向派生的控件属性`true`。You still instruct ASP.NET to perform event validation on the derived control by adding the attribute to the derived control itself and setting it to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 事件验证降低了未经授权的回发请求和回调的风险。Event validation reduces the risk of unauthorized postback requests and callbacks. 它指示 ASP.NET 进行验证仅在回发请求或回调过程可以在控件中引发这些事件。It instructs ASP.NET to validate only those events that can be raised in the control during a postback request or callback. 与此模型中，控件在呈现期间注册其事件，然后在回发或回调处理过程中验证事件。With this model, a control registers its events during rendering and then validates the events during the post-back or callback handling. 默认情况下，在 ASP.NET 中的所有事件驱动控件都使用此功能。All event-driven controls in ASP.NET use this feature by default.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableViewStateMac { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EnableViewStateMac : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether ASP.NET should run a message authentication code (MAC) on the page's view state when the page is posted back from the client.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether ASP.NET should run a message authentication code (MAC) on the page's view state when the page is posted back from the client.

value.span: 如果 ASP.NET 时应运行消息验证代码 (MAC) 上页面的视图状态从客户端，则回发页面否则为。

span.span: if ASP.NET should run a message authentication code (MAC) on the page's view state when the page is posted back from the client; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态 MAC 是变量的隐藏页发送到浏览器时，将页面的视图状态保存到的加密的版本。A view-state MAC is an encrypted version of the hidden variable that a page's view state is persisted to when the page is sent to the browser. 当此属性设置为`true`，加密的视图状态会检查以验证它的客户端上不被篡改。When this property is set to `true`, the encrypted view state is checked to verify that it has not been tampered with on the client. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此属性应永远不会设置为`false`生产 Web 站点，即使该应用程序或页不使用视图状态中。This attribute should never be set to `false` in a production Web site, even if the application or page does not use view state. 视图状态 MAC 有助于确保 ASP.NET 函数除了的视图状态中的安全。The view state MAC helps ensure the security of other ASP.NET functions in addition to the view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/usingpagessection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/usingpagessection.vb#8)]

[!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/usingpagessection.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/usingpagessection.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxPageStateFieldLength { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxPageStateFieldLength : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters that a single view-state field can contain.

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters that a single view-state field can contain.

value.span: 最大单个视图状态字段可以包含的字符数。

span.span: The maximum number of characters that a single view-state field can contain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呈现的页面或控件时，页和控件的视图状态存储视图状态的隐藏字段中。Page and control view state is stored in hidden view-state fields when the page or control is rendered. 如果存储的数据的长度超过值，则将数据拆分多个视图状态字段之间。If the length of the data stored exceeds the value, then the data is split between multiple view-state fields. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象对应于`@ Import`指令将 ASP.NET 页上。The objects correspond to the `@ Import` directive on an ASP.NET page. `Import`指令允许你指定自动导入到的应用程序的所有页的命名空间。The `Import` directive allows you to specify namespaces that are automatically imported into all the pages of an application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 分析器筛选器，这是实例的类中，由页面编译进程在分析的步骤，以允许在运行时更改源代码之前调用。A parser filter, which is an instance of the class, is called by the page compilation process before the parsing step to allow for changes to the source code at run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. public: property bool RenderAllHiddenFieldsAtTopOfForm { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RenderAllHiddenFieldsAtTopOfForm : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether all system-generated hidden fields are rendered at the top of the form.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether all system-generated hidden fields are rendered at the top of the form.

value.span: 如果窗体; 顶部呈现系统生成的隐藏的字段否则为。

span.span: if system-generated hidden fields are rendered at the top of the form; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性可指定一些系统生成的隐藏的字段将呈现在窗体的末尾。You can use the property to specify that some system-generated hidden fields are rendered at the end of the form. 在 ASP.NET 的之前版本.NET Framework 3.5 SP1，ASP.NET 呈现某些隐藏的字段 (例如， `__VIEWSTATE`) 窗体顶部。In versions of ASP.NET earlier than the .NET Framework 3.5 SP1, ASP.NET renders some hidden fields (for example, `__VIEWSTATE`) at the top of the form. 其他隐藏的字段 (例如， `__EVENTVALIDATION`) 靠近底部的窗体上，只需在关闭之前呈现``标记。Other hidden fields (for example, `__EVENTVALIDATION`) are rendered near the bottom of the form, just before the closing `` tag. 默认情况下，在 ASP.NET 3.5 SP1 中，在页面顶部呈现所有系统生成的隐藏的字段。By default, in ASP.NET 3.5 SP1, all system-generated hidden fields are rendered at the top of the page. 这样可以确保，即使之前页面加载完毕执行回发到服务器发送这些字段中的信息。This makes sure that the information in these fields is sent to the server even if a postback is performed before the page has finished loading. 如果设置为`false`，执行回发页面加载完毕之前可能会导致"回发或回调参数无效"错误。If is set to `false`, performing a postback before the page has finished loading can cause an "Invalid postback or callback argument" error. > [!NOTE] > 虽然属性名称指示"所有隐藏的域"，此属性设置不影响用户创建隐藏的字段。Although the property name indicates "all hidden fields," user-created hidden fields are not affected by settings for this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过比较所有输入的数据的潜在危险值列表与执行请求验证。Request validation is performed by comparing all input data to a list of potentially dangerous values. 如果出现匹配项，ASP.NET 将引发。If a match occurs, ASP.NET raises an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::ViewStateEncryptionMode ViewStateEncryptionMode { System::Web::UI::ViewStateEncryptionMode get(); void set(System::Web::UI::ViewStateEncryptionMode value); };
member this.ViewStateEncryptionMode : System.Web.UI.ViewStateEncryptionMode with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the encryption mode that ASP.NET uses when maintaining values.

span.span: Gets or sets the encryption mode that ASP.NET uses when maintaining values.

value.span: A枚举值，该值指示当值进行了加密。

span.span: A enumeration value indicating when the values are encrypted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能枚举的值为`Always`， `Auto`，和`Never`。The possible enumeration values are `Always`, `Auto`, and `Never`. 默认值为 `Auto`。The default value is `Auto`. 如果属性设置为`Auto`，`ViewState`时控件的请求而将加密。If property is set to `Auto`, `ViewState` will be encrypted when a control requests it.
